verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:31
verses.text: And the sons of Appaim; Ishi. And the sons of Ishi; Sheshan. And the children of Sheshan; Ahlai.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:32
verses.text: And the sons of Jada the brother of Shammai; Jether, and Jonathan: and Jether died without children.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:33
verses.text: And the sons of Jonathan; Peleth, and Zaza. These were the sons of Jerahmeel.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:34
verses.text: Now Sheshan had no sons, but daughters. And Sheshan had a servant, an Egyptian, whose name was Jarha.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:35
verses.text: And Sheshan gave his daughter to Jarha his servant to wife; and she bare him Attai.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:36
verses.text: And Attai begat Nathan, and Nathan begat Zabad,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:37
verses.text: And Zabad begat Ephlal, and Ephlal begat Obed,
